tool_description: Meet SparkLines API, your go-to for AI-crafted pickup lines that add a dash of charm to your app. Elevate user interactions with personalized, witty lines – because every connection deserves a spark!
name: Spark Lines API
title: Spark Lines API

api_list.name: Get AI Line
api_list.description:
This endpoint uses AI and a keyword to generate personalized and custom pickup lines. It takes a keyword as parameter e.g. 
{BaseURL}/api/ai-line?keyword=Ronaldo

api_list.name: Pickup Line By Category
api_list.description:
This endpoint gives pickup line specific for a category:
Following categories are supported:
1. Romantic
2. Clever
3. Geeky
4. Dev
5. All

Example Request URL: 
{BaseURL}/api/pickup-line?category=romantic

Categories should be in small case

api_list.name: Get Random Pickup Line
api_list.description: This endpoint gives a random pickup line on each request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spark-lines-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-pickup-line"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spark-lines-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spark-lines-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-pickup-line"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spark-lines-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
